content: the end of this row add another stitch by a m1r cast on in the middle of the row  you should now have 21 sts on your needles for casting on in the middle of the row here i 6sts + 3sts + 6sts + 6sts recommend the knitted cast on in doing purls from the wrong side as follows work row 4 to 8 of chart cuff b turn your work so that you look at the wrong side of bind off loosely your knitting and hold the needle with the last weave in ends in doing so close potential holes at knitted sts in your left hand now pick up the the bottom of the thumb following needle in your right hand insert into the first stitch on the left needle as if to purl purl one stitch and place this new stitch back on the left needle purlwise that s one stitch casted on repeat this two more times turn work again and move on in pattern bind off recommendation i d recommend the interlock bindoff for a clean and stretchy hem see instructions in this wonderful photo tutorial choosing the right yarn i d recommend a not-too-dark solid-coloured yarn with a crisp plied structure highly variegated or „fuzzy yarns won t show off the pattern and cables very well © jennifer büttgen 2014 v1 1 − 3 − for personal use only cuff a legend / rt / rt / rt / rt 9 / g g / g g / g g / g g 8 / g g / g g / g g / g g 7 / = purl stitch / rt / rt / rt / rt 6 / g g / g g / g g / g g 5 g = knit stitch / g g / g g / g g / g g 4 / rt / rt / rt / rt 3 ò = twisted stitch / g g / g g / g g / g g 2 knit through the back loop … / g g / g g / g g / g g ← 1 rt = left leaning cable knit/knit knit both sts as twisted knit sts yu = right leaning cable knit/knit knit both sts as twisted knit sts cuff b / g g / g g / g g / g g 8 rw = left leaning cable purl/knit purl the st in the back / rt / rt / rt / rt 7 knit front st as twisted st / g g / g g / g g / g g 6 / g g / g g / g g / g g 5 ou = right leaning cable knit/purl / rt / rt / rt / rt 4 knit front st as twisted st / g g / g g / g g / g g 3 purl the st in the back / g
